traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While Zi is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8+1) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) bludgeoning damage. Zi carries twenty sling stones.
